title: 3 and Out - OTA Coaching Compromises; Post-Rookie Holdout Era; Tebow PR Stunt; Brady/Arians; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - OTA Coaching Compromises; Post-Rookie Holdout Era; Tebow PR Stunt; Brady/Arians; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John discusses the compromises coaches have to make in the new world of OTA's as the players and the league continue to battle it out, why the new era of slotted rookie deals has been good for the overall NFL product, why the Tebow signing has been a home run as a publicity stunt, and how Bruce Arians and Brady have prolonged each other's careers. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
